direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying the status or state of a plan or transaction, with similar parameter handling and request types.
Both methods involve actions that change the state of a plan, such as pausing, resuming, or redeeming, with similar parameter requirements and request types.
The status of a one-time transaction can be affected by the change in plan status, indicating a dependency that can be tested together.
The list of plans can be affected by changes in plan status, suggesting a dependency that can be tested together.
The holding details of a plan can be affected by changes in plan status, indicating a dependency that can be tested together.
